name: tsdiapi-crud
description: A TSDIAPI plugin that provides automatic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) API generation for your database entities. It generates TypeScript modules and services with full type safety, validation, and best practices.

generators.name: base
generators.description: Generate CRUD API for a Prisma model

args.name: entityName
args.description: The name of the Prisma model (e.g., User, Product, Order). The case will be preserved as entered.

inquirer.message: Enter the name of the Prisma model (e.g., User, Product, Order)

prismaScripts.command: ADD MODEL {{pascalCase entityName}} ({id String @id @default(cuid()) | name String });
prismaScripts.description: Add the model to the Prisma schema
